Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
I have always found the abode of Akaalpurakh within my heart." (55) (3)
(The elation of) Begging in Your street, O Guru, is far better than any kingdom,
The enjoyment I got after I gave up my vanity and self-pride, was that of being the chief of two worlds." (55) (4)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਖੰਡ ਦੇ ਪਤਾਸੇ ਦਾ ਤੇਰੇ ਤੰਗ ਮੂੰਹ ਦੀ ਖੁਬਸੂਰਤੀ ਨਾਲ ਕੋਈ ਮੁਕਾਬਲਾ ਨਹੀਣ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: eI imsl rw ik gu&qm zIx ^Ubqr n bwSd [32[1[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
Goyaa says, "I heard the monition in my ears the very first day,
That I have seen the end of the world in its beginning." (55) (5)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਹਾਲਾਣਕਿ ਸਭ ਨਾਲੋਣ ਚੰਗੀ ਮਿਸਾਲ ਇਹ ਹੀ ਹੋ ਸਕਦੀ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: bw ihjr AwSnw SO gr qwilib vswlI [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
Goya says, "I have no unfriendly expectations or desires from my friend and beloved,    
I am not seeking any cure even for the anguish of my mind." (56) (1)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜੇਕਰ ਤੂੰ ਉਸ ਦੇ ਮਿਲਾਪ ਦਾ ਤਾਲਬ ਹੈਣ ਤਾਣ ਵਿਛੋੜੇ ਦਾ ਵਾਕਫ ਬਣ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: rh kY brI bmMzl qw rwhbr n bwSd [32[2[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: I am sick because of the Narcissus friend who has complete control on Narcissus itself as a slave,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਹੀ ਤੇ ਰਾਹ ਦਿਖਾਉਣ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ, ਉਸ ਦੇ ਬਗੈਰ ਤੂੰ ਆਪਣੇ ਪੜਾਉ ਤੱਕ ਕਿਵੇਣ ਪੁਜ ਸਕੇਣਗਾ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: dwmwin cSm mguzwr Az dsq hmcU imzgwx [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
I do not hanker either for Khizar or Messiah who could play their part as healers of this illness." (56) (2)
Wherever I see, I see only the splendor of Your beauty,
In fact, I do not look for any other show except the glow of my Beloved. (56) (3)
When I  am in the company of my beloved, I do not look at anyone else,
In fact, I do not even open my eyes in front of anyone else. (56) (4)
I sacrifice my life like a moth while fluttering around the oil-lamp,
But, I do not make any useless wails, screams and shrieks like a nightingale." (56) (5)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਪਲਕਾਣ ਵਾਣਗ ਤੂੰ ਭੀ ਅੱਖਾਣ ਦਾ ਪੱਲਾ ਉਤਨੀ ਦੇਰ ਨ ਛੱਡ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: qw jyib AwrzUhw pur Az guhr n bwSd [32[3[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
Goyaa says to himself, "Just keep quiet, do not utter even a word! The deal of my love for my Beloved is with my head,
As long as this head is there, this deal will not be annulled." (56) (6)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜਦ ਤਕ ਕਿ ਤੇਰੀਆਣ ਆਸਾਣ ਦੀ ਜੇਬ ਮੋਤੀਆਣ ਨਾਲ ਨਾ ਭਰ ਜਾਵੇ ।

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: “I always spend my life's time in His remembrance; this life is meaningful only so long as we love the Truth,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਆਸ਼ਕ ਦੀ ਆਸ ਦੀ ਟਹਿਣੀ ਕਦੀ ਵੀ ਫਲਦੀ ਜਾਣ ਫੁਲਦੀ ਨਹੀਣ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: Az ASik Awib imzgwx qwx sbz-qr nih bwSd [32[4[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, I am chagrined but eternally grateful of the enormous obligations and kindnesses bestowed on me by my Master.” (57) (1)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜਦ ਤਕ ਕਿ ਪਲਕਾਣ ਦੇ ਅਥਰੂਆਣ ਨਾਲ ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਪਾਣੀ ਨਹੀਣ ਮਿਲਦਾ ।

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: A self centered egoist does not accept nor believe in meditation,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਐ, ਮੂਰਖ ਗੋਯਾ, ਤੂੰ ਫਾਲਤੂ ਗੱਲਾਣ ਨ ਕਰ, ਉਸ ਦੇ ਪਿਆਰ ਦੀ ਡੀਣਗ ਨ ਮਾਰ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: ko pw nhd drIx rih Awx rw sr nih bwSd [32[5[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: However, Akaalpurakh is always the Master and we, the worldly earthlings, His slaves for ever. (57) (2)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਸ ਰਸਤੇ ਤੇ ਉਹੀ ਪੈਰ ਰਖ ਸਕਦਾ ਹੈ, ਜਿਸ ਨੇ ਆਪਣਾ ਸਿਰ ਪਹਿਲਾਣ ਹੀ ਕਟਾ ਛੱਡਿਆ ਹੋਵੇ।
